value.title: U.S. regulators open process to ensure self-driving car safety
value.excerpt: U.S. auto safety regulators on Thursday said they were opening a formal regulatory proceeding that could eventually result in the adoption of new safety standards for autonomous vehicles.

value.title: Uber looks to partner with other self-driving companies: CEO
value.excerpt: Uber Technologies Inc's self-driving unit is looking to partner with other companies working on autonomous driving, the company's chief executive officer said on Wednesday.

value.title: BlackBerry (BB) QNX Software to Boost Plus' Self Driving Trucks
value.excerpt: BlackBerry Limited BB recently announced that it has collaborated with a self-driving truck technology provider, Plus, to integrate its much-acclaimed QNX technology in the latter’s Class 8 self-driving trucks.

value.title: ‘It is going to be a race with Tesla’ says VW about new investments in electric cars and self-driving
value.excerpt: The Volkswagen Group just announced that it is accelerating its investments in software, electric vehicles, and self-driving technology and it is not shying away from the fact that its goal is to catch up to Tesla.

value.title: Zipper Merging Is A Frenzied Traffic Squeeze Play On Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Zipper merging, whereby cars are shunted into a 2-into-1 lane narrowing, can be especially tough on self-driving cars.

value.title: China Gets Ready to Rein in Baidu, Alibaba, and Tencent
value.excerpt: Newly drafted antitrust rules could make it tougher for the BAT triumvirate to continue expanding their ecosystems.

value.title: Uber reportedly may sell its self-driving car division to rival Aurora
value.excerpt: Uber is in talks to sell its autonomous vehicle unit to startup competitor Aurora Innovation, TechCrunch reported. If it comes to pass, the sale of Uber Advanced Technologies Group (UberATG), would mark the end of a bumpy road for a division of Uber that was valued at $7.

value.title: Velodyne aims to price new self-driving car sensor below $500
value.excerpt: Velodyne Lidar Inc said on Friday it would introduce a new lidar unit, a key sensor in self-driving cars, with a target price point of less than $500 and no moving parts.

value.title: Uber in talks to sell its ATG self-driving unit to Aurora - source
value.excerpt: Uber Technologies Inc <UBER.N> is in talks to sell its autonomous driving unit, Uber Advanced Technologies Group (ATG), to self-driving car startup Aurora, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.

value.title: Uber in talks to sell ATG self-driving unit to Aurora
value.excerpt: Uber’s self-driving car unit, Uber Advanced Technologies Group, was valued at $7.25 billion following a $1 billion investment from Toyota, DENSO and Softbank’s Vision Fund. Now, it’s up for sale and a competing autonomous vehicle technology startup is in talks with Uber to buy

value.title: Weather-proof chip aims to take self-driving tech, wireless communications to next level
value.excerpt: A new device can overcome challenges like bad weather to deliver more secure, reliable communications. This could aid military communications in challenging areas, improve the ability of self-driving cars to see the environment around them and speed up wireless data for potential 6G networks.

value.title: Join the Final Lap of the 2020 DeepRacer League at AWS re:Invent 2020
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get rolling with machine learning (ML). It’s a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a 3D racing simulator, and a global racing league. value.title: Honda ‘Traffic Jam Pilot’ Offers Standby Self-Driving By March 2021
value.excerpt: Honda will release "Traffic Jam Pilot" within months. That's full self-driving while in traffic jams, in a consumer car.

value.title: Walmart Tests Self-Driving Car Deliveries in Arizona

value.title: Walmart and GM's Cruise partner for self-driving deliveries in Arizona

value.title: Treviranus, Butler and Fruchterman to speak at Sight Tech Global

value.title: Walmart and Cruise launch pilot to deliver orders via self-driving cars
value.excerpt: As part of the pilot, which is scheduled to begin in early 2021, customers will be able to place orders from a Walmart and have them delivered via one of Cruise’s electric self-driving Chevy Bolts.
